sentences.en: Africa , are you aware that you have sired a revolutionary genius?
sentences.cn: 阿非利加,你儿子是个非凡的天才, 你知道不知道?

sentences.en: Full of militancy and revolutionary ardour, the people of all nationalities in the country are working hard for the realization of the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 全国各族人民意气风发, 斗志昂扬,为实现四个现代化而奋战.

sentences.en: Gauss did see the most revolutionary implication.
sentences.cn: Gauss确实看到了最富有变革性的含义.

sentences.en: Genetic engineering will have revolutionary consequences for mankind.
sentences.cn: 遗传工程将对人类产生深远的影响。

sentences.en: He was by nature revolutionary and unconventional.
sentences.cn: 他生来具有叛逆的,不落俗套的性格.

sentences.en: His playing as a trumpet player was quite revolutionary.
sentences.cn: 他的小号演奏独创一格。

sentences.en: How did a song help the Colonial soldiers win the Revolutionary War?
sentences.cn: 殖民地的士兵是如何藉由一首歌的帮助,打赢独立战争的?

sentences.en: In the late Seventies, things had to be new, modern, revolutionary.
sentences.cn: 20世纪70年代晚期，一切都要新奇、时髦、标新立异。

sentences.en: Sam knew that Derogil, to control high blood pressure, was not a revolutionary drug.
sentences.cn: 萨姆知道, 用于控制血压的“定压”不是一种突破性的药物.

sentences.en: Some of them dropped out of the revolutionary ranks and became passive.
sentences.cn: 他们有些掉了队,消极了起来.

sentences.en: The artist was revolutionary in both subject matter and technique.
sentences.cn: 这位画家在内容和手法两方面都有重大创新。

sentences.en: The new cancer drug is a revolutionary breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 这种抗癌新药是一个革命性突破。

sentences.en: The revolutionary NIB - SEAL bronze ball valve stops condensate, cold.
sentences.cn: 具有创新功能的NIB-SEAL青铜球阀能够防止冷凝和冷却.

sentences.en: There are several tombs of revolutionary martyrs in this cemetery.
sentences.cn: 这个墓园里有好几座烈士墓.

sentences.en: This is a revolutionary new way of growing rice.
sentences.cn: 这是一种全新的种稻方法.

words.tran_cn: 旋转（revolve的过去式，过去分词）
旋转；循环出现；反复考虑
彻底改变（等于revolutionize）；使革命化
发动革命；彻底改革；宣传革命
使…旋转；使…循环；反复考虑

trans.tran_cn: 革命的，创新的，突破性的
trans.tran_en: completely new and different, especially in a way that leads to great improvements
someone who joins in or supports a political or social revolution
